title: Holy Father's Prayer Intention for June
content: The Holy Father's prayer intention for June is: Universal Intention (Social Networks): "That social networks may work towards that inclusiveness which respects others for their difference."
contentWithMarkup:
The Holy Father's prayer intention for June is:

Universal Intention (Social Networks): "That social networks may work towards that inclusiveness which respects others for their difference."

feed.name: Lop Notes
feed.description: News and notes from Tom Lopatosky on a variety of subjects including religion (especially Roman Catholicism); inspiration; New England; fire, rescue, and emergency medical services; and municipal government issues.
